We found it difficult to process data from the MBQC project into usable form, so created this package to increasing accessibility of this important data resource.

We think the authors of the study for making this data publicly available.

## Vignette Info

This vignette will lead you through

- Access MBQC data objects

## Loading the package and data

Download the latest version of the package from github.

```{r}
library(tibble)
# library(mbqc)
# data(m)
```
